TopicTitle: Anyone knows a mod for better reentry fx?

Articles.Content:
The title says it all. A few years ago someone uploaded this:

And my questio is:

Is a mod like it in development or already available?

That video was from squad which you would know if you read the short description on the videos page. Plus how can you not tell that is the exact effects we have no LOL. No there is no other options available.
